keyword.name: sir

param.name: nbits
param.desc: The number to bits to be pushed.

param.name: tdi()
param.desc: The value to be pushed through TDI.

keyword.desc: Pushes a value to the instruction register.

keyword.name: runtest

param.name: nclocks
param.desc: The number of clocks to be run in the idle state.

keyword.desc: Activates a automate test present in the IC.

keyword.name: sir

param.name: nbits
param.desc: The number to bits to be pushed.

param.name: tdi()
param.desc: The value to be pushed through TDI.

param.name: mask()
param.desc: (Optional) A mask used when testing the value scanned from TDO.

keyword.desc: Pushes a value to the instruction register and checks the value scanned from TDO.

keyword.name: sdr

param.name: nbits
param.desc: The number to bits to be pushed.

param.name: tdi()
param.desc: The value to be pushed through TDI.

keyword.desc: Pushes a value to the data register.

keyword.name: sdr

param.name: nbits
param.desc: The number to bits to be pushed.

param.name: tdi()
param.desc: The value to be pushed through TDI.

param.name: mask()
param.desc: (Optional) A mask used when testing the value scanned from TDO.

keyword.desc: Pushes a value to the data register and checks the value scanned from TDO.

keyword.name: seltap
keyword.desc: Select the TAP controller being used on the board.

param.name: tapId
param.desc: The TMS value, can only be 0 or 1.

keyword.name: state
keyword.desc: Sets the TAP controller to the state specified in the argument.
